data:
Here is a list of out-of-scope features for PREVENT-IA:

* Social media management and marketing
* Gamification of learning experience
* Integration with other LMS (Learning Management Systems)
* Multi-language support
* Integration with HR management systems
* Virtual reality or augmented reality experiences
* Mobile app development
* Customer support ticket management
* Integration with enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems
* Integration with health and safety data analysis tools
* Advanced data analytics and reporting
* Integration with wearable safety devices
* Integration with emergency response systems
* Integration with supply chain management systems
* Integration with performance management systems
* Integration with project management tools
* Integration with time tracking and scheduling software
* Integration with quality control systems
* Integration with inventory management systems
* Integration with financial management systems.

After reviewing this list, I believe the most consistent and comprehensive out-of-scope features for PREVENT-IA are:

* Social media management and marketing
* Gamification of learning experience
* Multi-language support
* Integration with other LMS (Learning Management Systems)
* Virtual reality or augmented reality experiences
* Mobile app development
* Customer support ticket management
* Advanced data analytics and reporting
* Integration with wearable safety devices
* Integration with emergency response systems
* Integration with supply chain management systems
* Integration with performance management systems
* Integration with project management tools
* Integration with time tracking and scheduling software
* Integration with quality control systems
* Integration with inventory management systems
* Integration with financial management systems.
